addiofo:
Sterling scored his first career hat-trick for Manchester City in a 5-1 win against Bournemouth on October 17, 2015.

Sterling scored his first UEFA Champions League goal for Manchester City in a 3-1 win away to Sevilla on November 3, 2015.

Sterling scored twice in the final ten minutes of a Champions League group stage fixture against Borussia Mönchengladbach, helping Manchester City secure a 4-2 win on December 8, 2015.

Sterling suffered a groin injury in a match against Manchester United on March 20, 2016, ruling him out for eight weeks.

Sterling was named Premier League Player of the Month for August 2016 after scoring two goals and providing one assist in three games.
